definition: A term that refers to the state or quality of being able to do or achieve something, often used to describe a range of options or alternatives available in a given situation. It is commonly employed to discuss potential courses of action, available choices, or the feasibility of certain outcomes.

examples.german: Die Möglichkeit besteht, dass er kommt.
examples.english: There is a possibility that he will come.

examples.german: Ich habe keine Möglichkeit, das zu tun.
examples.english: I have no way to do that.

examples.german: Es gibt viele Möglichkeiten, dieses Problem zu lösen.
examples.english: There are many ways to solve this problem.

examples.german: Er hat die Möglichkeit, sich zu verbessern.
examples.english: He has the opportunity to improve himself.

examples.german: Die Möglichkeit besteht, dass es regnen wird.
examples.english: There is a chance of rain.
